remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取屬性控制項或屬性控制擷取物件。Accessing the property of a control or the property of a control retrieves a object. 您可以新增或移除在執行階段集合中的項目。You can add or remove items from the collection at run time. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呼叫這個方法之後，屬性會傳回`true`。After this method has been called, the property will return `true`. 此外，屬性中的物件會設定為`true`。Also, the property of the objects in the will be set to `true`.
